org.openbel.framework.core.df.cache
Class CacheUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.openbel.framework.core.df.cache.CacheUtil

public class CacheUtil
extends Object

Static utility methods for dealing with the BELFramework cache.

Author:
Anthony Bargnesi <abargnesi@selventa.com>

Method Detail

resolveResource

public static File resolveResource(String resourceLocation,
                                   String localPath,
                                   String localFileName)
                            throws ResourceDownloadError
Resolves a resource location to a local path.

Parameters:
resourceLocation - String, the resource location that defines where to pull the file, which cannot be null
localPath - String, the local path to store the resource at, which cannot be null
localFileName - String, the local file name to store the resource as, which cannot be null
Returns:
File, the resource resolved to a local file
Throws:
ResourceDownloadError - Thrown if a resource download error occurred while resolving the resource location

downloadResource

public static File downloadResource(String remoteLocation,
                                    ResourceType type)
                             throws ResourceDownloadError
Download the resource and hash the contents using Hasher.

Parameters:
remoteLocation - String, the remote resource location
type - ResourceType, the resource type
Returns:
File the downloaded resource file, decompressed if the file is in GZIP format
Throws:
ResourceDownloadError - Thrown if the remote resource could not be downloaded
IOException - Thrown if an IO error occurred while handling the resources

getResourceFolderPath

public static String getResourceFolderPath(ResourceType type)
Returns the absolute path for the sub-directory resource folder using the cache directory provided by SystemConfiguration.getCacheDirectory().

If the sub-directory resource folder does not exist it will be created.

If the SystemConfiguration object's cache directory does not exist or the SystemConfiguration has not been created then an IllegalStateException will be thrown.

Returns:
String, the absolute path for the sub-directory resource folder
Throws:
IllegalStateException - Thrown if the SystemConfiguration object's cache directory does not exist, is not readable, is not writable, or if the SystemConfiguration has not been created yet.

createLocalHash

public static File createLocalHash(File resource,
                                   String remoteLocation)
                            throws ResourceDownloadError
Creates a hash of the contents of the File resource and writes it to a file alongside the real resource file. The hash file can be found by appending ResourceType#SHA256_EXTENSION to the resource path.

Parameters:
resource - File, the local resource file
remoteLocation - String, the remote resource location
Returns:
File, the local hash file that was created
Throws:
IOException - Thrown if there was an IO error reading the local resource file, or writing the local hash file
ResourceDownloadError

encodeLocation

public static String encodeLocation(String location)
Encodes the resource location as a one-way SHA256 hash.

Parameters:
location - String, the resource location
Returns:
String the SHA256 hash of the resource location

copyToDirectory

public static File copyToDirectory(File resource,
                                   String resourceLocation,
                                   File copy)
                            throws ResourceDownloadError
Copies the resolved resource to the system's temporary directory pointed to by the system property java.io.tmpdir.

GZIP Decompression occur on the file if the cached resource is found to contain the GZIP_MAGIC_NUMBER. See copyWithDecompression(File, String, File).

Parameters:
resource - File, the resource file to copy from
resourceLocation - String, the resource location url
copy - File, the resource file to copy to
Returns:
File, the resource file in the system's temp directory
Throws:
ResourceDownloadError - Thrown if an IO error copying the resource
